website_summaries.verdict: A good alternative for batch formula mixing. Includes more ergonomic features like a comfortable handle and stirrer.
pros: Uses a unique mixing blade that stirs the formula powder and water from the bottom, catching any clumps that may float down
The included spout makes it easy to pour the formula into a bottle
Mixes and stores up to 24 oz
cons: Stirring handle takes some effort to rotate for short periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Could do without the mold!
customer_reviews.text: Was great until the black mold appeared! Absolutely disgusting and very disturbing. The problem with this set up is the piece that had the mold is not removable and has a very small small cut which allows moisture but no way to clean it. After trying to open up the gap with a knife and scraping a rather large amount of mold I decided just to cut off the piece and I’m so glad I did. I did enjoy being able to mix a large amount of formula at once and it was ove very convenient to use. The mold I cannot overlook though, especially when feeding my baby!
customer_reviews.author: Battney

customer_reviews.title: Breastmilk storage
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store breastmilk that I pump each day then at the end of the day pour into freezer bags. It saves on the clutter of a ton of bottles in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyto4boys

customer_reviews.title: BLACK MOLD, do your kid a favor and snap the handle in half.. you'll see.
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 of these for about a month. Then i saw the review about the mold so i snapped one of the handles in half just to check, sure enough BLACK MOLD. The handle is not solid plastic, both of the parts that seal the bottle are seperate pieces so they both take on water when washed. The handle is actually 2 pieces it also takes on water. Do your kid a favor and snap the handle in half. Then change your reviews so no one gets there kid sick from this cheaply made crap.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: If using formula BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so dead set on breastfeeding but I had a week long hospitalization when my son was 2 weeks old, after a series of unfortunate events we are now using formula. This has easily been the most useful formula purchase. Shaking bottles is time consuming and creates air bubbles. Once in the morning and once before night I mix my sons formula in this. It's quick, gets all the clumps and it's so nice just being able to pour his formula out and either warm the bottle or feed him asap (depending on how hungry he is).
customer_reviews.author: Yoambre

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited to try this because I'd previously use two ...
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this because I'd previously use two other containers to make batches of formula and they all had their own issues. I poured in 24oz of water and then put in 7 scoops of powder and it was too full so I needed to mix that before adding in the remaining formula. Slightly annoying but not a huge deal. Got all of the formula in and mixed it really well. Shook the container too. Still a good sized clump of formula stuck to the bottom that the mixer in the middle won't touch - almost half a scoop worth of powder.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose well
customer_reviews.text: The time ring around the top that is supposed to mark what time you made the formula spins too easily making it ineffective, and the numbers rubbed off with the second wash, making it useless. I just jot down on a dry erase board on refrigerator door what time the batch of formula is made for tracking. That's my only real complaint. Would be nice if the top sealed entirely to ensure freshness, but the mixing handle creates a fairly good seal. I use it to mix four bottles worth of formula before daycare instead of shaking them individually. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: caseymusic

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this and for some reason the one I received wasn't working correctly. I contacted them and they paid for me to ship it back and sent a new one. This one is working perfectly! I am so impressed by their customer service. Carla was VERY helpful and quick with responding. I love the convenience of having pre-made formula in my fridge. Would absolutely recommend the pitcher and all munchkin products after this experience!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Vine-Akuh

customer_reviews.title: A must for families using formula
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for anyone who is giving their children powdered formula. It's so easy to mix up a full batch of what you're going to need for the day in fill the bottles as you go. Make sure you only plunge the plunger in the formula don't bring it above the formula otherwise you were going to create more bubbles. It makes the powdered formula very well and helped cut down on the bubbles which helped prevent baby from getting gassy. Very easy to clean in spite of what some of the other reviews say.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: I've also found the mixing to be pretty easy, I haven't had any issues with air ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a busy, working Mom- and this mixer has already made my life so much easier! I pre-mix my baby's formula, pop it in the fridge, and leave it with my babysitter to pour throughout the day. The size is large enough to contain all of my daughter's bottles for the full day- so one mix and I'm done! I've also found the mixing to be pretty easy, I haven't had any issues with air bubbles or frothiness- which is also a huge bonus over shaking each individual bottle up. The only minor drawback for me is that green isn't my favorite color, but overall it's a modern looking item so I don't mind. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mama of Two

customer_reviews.title: Breastmilk Jug
customer_reviews.text: I’m exclusively pumping for my LO and I was tired of constantly washing multiple bottles. Now I pump, wait til it cools off and pour into this jug until my baby is ready to eat! I love how it’s not big like Dr Brown’s jug.
customer_reviews.author: Kaner88

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. My son was recently switched to Enfamil AR, which clumps so so bad, made worse by his high calorie formula requirements. I've been running each bottle through a metal strainer. Every bottle, round the clock. But not anymore. I can make 20oz at a time and just use it as is. For this tired Momma, it has been sanity saving. I just can't recomend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: MrsAdventure

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose of mixing formula in bulk, so I'm overall satisfied. However, the numbers on the "time dial" started scratching/rubbing off after the first wash. SMH. I just make sure I prep a few ounces less than a 24 hour batch so I don't have to remember what time I prepped it. I also have the Dr Brown's mixing pitcher. I've used them both for about 2-3 weeks, now. The only pro Dr Brown's has over Munchkin is that DB can hold larger batches. The numbers on the DB pitcher are hard to see because they're clear and blend into the plastic. The Munchkin one is way easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Make your life easier and buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this pitcher! It made my life a lot easier. Instead of mixing each feed in the bottle and dealing with the froth that causes baby gas, I am mixing the 24 hour feeds all at once and putting them in the fridge. I use a bottle warmer, of course. This pitcher mixes the formula really well in a matter of seconds with minimal efforts and makes no froth! Yaaay. I also love how easy it is to clean!! It's made of good material that has not molded yet even when leaving it not washed overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ali

customer_reviews.title: Super Convenient & Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: This has been so helpful to make a day's batch of formula for my daughter in the morning and use it throughout the day during her feedings. I also like the stirring stick to mix the formula instead of the shaker bottles I used to use. This helps prevent any air bubbles to form while mixing formula. I also think the time ring around the top of the pitcher is super helpful so you know when you made the formula and how long it will be good for. Definitely a solid purchase! One thing I didn't know I would need, since I started out breastfeeding at the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product made my life sooo much easier. I never put it on my registry because I thought it was unnecessary but after I had to supplement with formula I realized how helpful it is. My little one was super gassy and pre mixing the formula helped a lot. Also, it is great to just pour it in bottles and warm up for feedings, especially at night.
customer_reviews.author: Ice Bee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for formula
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Total game changer for formula. We use a formula with cereal pre added for acid reflux which was always super difficult to mix without getting clumps and this thing is magic! Really effective at getting the formula very smooth. It’s been used multiple times a day and shows absolutely no wear. I can’t recommend this enough. I’m totally keeping it even after we need it for formula to use for frothing milk or making salad dressing
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Labrada

customer_reviews.title: Gets moldy in uncleanable places
customer_reviews.text: This worked great while it lasted. After about two months it developed mold in the seams of the green silicone part of the mixer handle. This is with cleaning it immediately after use, every time. I considered getting a replacement but my baby eats more than 24oz a day now anyway, so it's not really useful anymore.
customer_reviews.author: catdrawing

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT! Literally the best thing I’ve bought for my daughter LOL. I’m not even kidding. Once I switched to formul feeding I was soooo tired from mixing formula and all of the clumps. But this literally is perfection. I didn’t think it would make that much of a difference but wow. It holds 24 oz which is almost enough for a full 24 hrs worth of feeding. Plus it has a little dial where you can put what time you mixed it.
customer_reviews.author: Keirsten

customer_reviews.title: Freaking Amazing
customer_reviews.text: As a new parent I had no idea these even existed. And let me tell you it is a huge Time saver and gives you peace of mind. Those middle-of-the-night feedings when I had to throw away formula because I lost count of how many scoops, this helps! We have found it easy to clean, our dishwasher has a steam and sanitize cycle and it holds up very well. I ended up actually buying one more just to make sure I always had one clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cinimini

customer_reviews.title: Great concept
customer_reviews.text: So I guess the concept behind this is great so all you have to do is mix the formula in the morning and stick it in the fridge, then when you need it just pour the desired amount into a bottle and you’re good to go. This would be great but my baby likes his formula warm, so I’d still have to wait for the formula to warm up. I’m sure it’d work great with a bottle warmer but I don’t have one.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to making lots of formula at once I was making several bottles and taking up space in my fridge.. I finally had enough and ordered this pitcher. I LOVE IT! So much that my mother ended up ordering one for her house. Such a simple item and it makes a world a difference for a busy parent who makes large batches of formula at a time. Will be ordering one for friends in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product! I didn’t have any issues with the time keeper piece easily moving. You have to completely lift it in order to turn it, and then snap it back in place. So I’m not sure how other people are struggling with it. I took a picture of how much formula I made after mixing 24 ounces of water with the appropriate amount of formula. It mixes well and I like that it barely bubbles at all. Would highly recommend for those who use formula!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Tuten

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself to this beauty
customer_reviews.text: Why isn’t this being given at more baby showers?! Get it for yourself, your family, your friends, even people you don’t even like and you want to get karma points. It’s so helpful to have pre-mixed formula at all times. Especially when you have 3 kids and a baby like me. If there was a house fire, this would be one of the things I would grab on my way out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Tati H

customer_reviews.title: Mixes formula perfectly! DO NOT STERILIZE IN MICROWAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for someone who uses a lot of formula. I supplement so we don’t need to much daily, but it blends the formula with water better than hand shaking the bottles. No clumps and lumps! Don’t sterilize in the microwave. It will melt the mixer portion and it will break off. I made that mistake 😭 but the price for these are great so I bought another to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be sterilized
customer_reviews.text: Didn't read much before buying, but this cannot be sterilized. We have well water, so sterilization is important to me. Actually did okay the first time I microwave sterilized it. Melted the second time (when I finally read enough that it could not be sterilized). Mixed well, so it was a bit of a disappointment to discover I can't sterilize. Switched to a mason jar with a pour top instead.
customer_reviews.author: V. Landis

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with Functionality
customer_reviews.text: This Formula Mixer by Munchkin is fantastic! Based on others reviews, I was a little concerned that pumping it was going to be difficult but I have had zero issues with it. In fact, my toddler is even able to help with it without strain. The mixer, when used according to the instructions, does not create air bubbles and the counter feature on the lid is so handy. After use, I put the entire thing in the dishwasher and it's ready to go for the next batch. Overall, I was very impressed with the Mixer and would recommend it to any formula using family!
customer_reviews.author: Weimmom

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this! This is my 3rd baby and I’ve used the Dr Browns mixing pitcher with the other 2. I wanted to replace it because I noticed some mold in the handle which I couldn’t get completely clean. I really like this one has more of a seal when the lid/spout is closed. Also, this one doesn’t create near the bubbles and foam when mixing that the DB one does.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hunter

customer_reviews.title: We exclusively formula feed and this pitcher makes it so ...
customer_reviews.text: We exclusively formula feed and this pitcher makes it so much easier! It mixes the formula quickly and well, and makes late night feedings easier. Unlike the Dr. Brown's pitcher, this one has a place for you to mark the time of day you made the pitcher, and it has a way for the lid to seal tightly where the spout is located.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Tilson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well. Very easy to use and clean. Makes minimal amount of bubbles and makes making formula super quick and easy. I know that once baby is bigger and drinking more I’ll have to buy a second so there’s enough for the day but for now it’s even more than what I need capacity wise. Definitely happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes feedings easier!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I truly feel like it removes the gas bubbles much better. Plus, my baby’s reflux is doing better now that she’s getting warm milk. Only flaw is the ring up top where you can note when you made the formula. GENIUS addition to the product (mom brain is real I don’t remember anything) but the ring is hard to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: N T

customer_reviews.title: Great for breastmilk too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for putting my pumped breastmilk in and putting into bags later to freeze. Also is great because when I leave my son with someone, I fill this with frozen milk because it holds a whole days worth of milk for him. Frozen milk can only be used 24 hours after fully thawed to it’s great for that. Mixes the fat in milk beautifully too making the next bottle you make the perfect mix of the fore milk (watery milk) and hindmilk (fatty milk)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this formula pitcher! We have preemie twins who need special high calorie formula that is a little complicated to mix up. We were storing the formula in bottles but it only lasted for a few feedings. With this pitcher, you can mix a whole day’s worth for 2 babies! Feeding twins is hectic and this pitcher mAkes it a little easier to manage. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ajsymonds

customer_reviews.title: Ok,but flawed.
customer_reviews.text: Convenient formula storage, yes, but the plunger/mixer doesn't go all the way to the bottom so the powder tends to clump up down there until you stir it.... defeating the point. This can be fixed by pouring about 10 ounces of water into the container with the mixer plunger REMOVED,and swirling it around until it dissolves. Then add the remaining water.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Makes feeding much easier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It allows me to.make a large amount of formula at a time and just pour it into bottles as needed which is fantastic when you have a hungry crying baby you need to feed as fast as possible. Its also great for premaking a lot of bottles at once especially if your baby is eating an odd number of ounces from every bottle
customer_reviews.author: Lifeguard7

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer but it’s just a few ounces too small
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this pitcher for the first two months of our little guy’s life. It’s been great! Mixes and pours very well. Our only complaint is that our kiddo is now taking more than 24 oz/day. I like to make formula once a day so we are going to get the Dr Brown’s that is a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: How did I not m ow about this for baby #1?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is genius. I love being able to make 24 oz (or however much you need in 24 hours) and it being all mixed and ready to pour. this makes life much easier during those middle of the night feedings. The ability to also use the green ring to show when it was made. I would not travel with formula in the container because I don’t know how well the handle part seals.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for mixing up fortified breastmilk and occasionally small batches of formula. it is very easy to use and clean. I love the size of it as it doesn't take up a ton of space in my fridge. I plan to also use this to do the "pitcher method" of storing breast milk once my supply regulates. this pitcher is pretty sturdy. I love the little ring to mark when the batch was made.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bramlett

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This makes life with a baby so much easier! No more making each bottle one at a time while your baby is screaming! No more bubbles from shaking it! Just make enough formula that you need for a day. Then you can just pour into your bottle and heat it up! It mixes the formula perfectly. The formula has time to settle in the fridge so there's no foam or bubbles. I wish I bought this sooner. Honestly I almost bought a baby breeza for $200. This is better for ten bucks! It's sturdy enough when it's full and it's thin enough so it doesn't take up a lot of space in your fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Breastmilk Moms too!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for women who have an oversupply of breastmilk too! You can gather breast milk during the day (pitcher method) and then prep your baby’s bottles for the next day. The day/time top is perfect for not forgetting when the milk was first added to the pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful but measurements are fading
customer_reviews.text: This product has made my life so much easier as I prepare my son's bottles. It's important that the measurement is accurate in terms of water to powder, because as a preemie he needs a certain number of calories. Unfortunately after daily use, the measurements on the outside of the pitcher have begun to wear away. Without the measurements, the product is useless for us. So I have had to reenforce the measurements with a sharpie. I've only had the pitcher for a little over a month and have never scrubbed it nor used harsh soap to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little gadget to have for formula feeding. It’s very handy having a decent amount ready and waiting in the refrigerator, rather than having to go through all the steps while baby is losing complete patience with waiting! Would make a great gift for any bottlefeeding mommy.
customer_reviews.author: DebS

customer_reviews.title: Smart design, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This formula pitcher was such a great purchase. Rather than making up bottles one at a time, we make up a big batch in this pitcher. The plunger makes the powder mix in super easily without a lot of foaming and there's a rubber stopper over the pour spout so that the formula pitcher stays closed up tight in the fridge. I'm so glad we bought one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L. Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This makes mixing formula so much easier, my only complaint would probably be that its not bigger. I have twins and at 4 months they drink 12 oz total per feed, which means every two feeds I'm having to remake this whole pitcher. I wish it was just a little bigger so I wasn't still feeling like Im constantly making formula lol. Other than that, its great and I recommend it. Gets all clumps out, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Zia

customer_reviews.title: MOLD - DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: We love the functionality of this pitcher to make a larger quantity of formula. We do not love the mold. The stirring wheel must be removed on every wash, which is inconvenient, but acceptable. The stirring handle has a plug to seal the pitcher and it is not a solid piece, there is a gap all the way around and there is no way to clean it. Mold grows there and is released into the formula. This pitcher is totally unacceptable and even dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: HealthyMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We started making bigger bottles and there wasn't enough room in the bottle to shake it. The formula was staying chunky and not mixing. I was stuck between this the doctor brown or the baby brezza one. I ended up making my decision because the reviews said the doctor Brown leaked in the baby brezza could not go in the dishwasher because it's electric. This one is a great it does not leak and I can put it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Easy BUT
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and loved it! We could make plenty of formula and use it at our baby's convenience through out the day. HOWEVER after a few washes the outside markings came off. It was a hassle because you can't measure the water accordingly WITHOUT the measurements on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Less Bubbles & No More Post-it Notes
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased. Using this pitcher provides less bubbles in bottle (when pouring out bubbles don’t follow) and the time dial has saved me from having to use post-it notes! I will take it when we travel and I guess it is somewhat compact for that.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsa

customer_reviews.title: Can not disassemble to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use however when the spiral shaft goes through the lid you are unable to disassemble to clean properly and completely. Been using for almost 2 months cleaning after every use you can see the pinkish color in my picture. That is even after spending 15 minutes under steaming hot water with soap and sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price. I mean I think it’s a bit expensive for what it is but I’d definitely buy it again. We add yogurt to my son’s formula and it’s amazing. I make a pitcher every morning. It saves me so much time throughout the day. It very throughly mixes the formula without creating much foam. I absolutely love it! My only issue is that the print on the time stamp is wearing off already.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Better than dr browns
customer_reviews.text: This is sooooo much better than dr browns. It’s better quality plastic and actually mixes the formula easy even into cold water. Easy to use and clean, would recommend to any formula mamas looking to make a few bottles at a time
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I only used this a couple times because the powder seemed to settle down at the bottom after being in the fridge and it was too hard to get it stirred up again because there's ridges at the bottom. I prefer using a blender bottle meant for protein shakes, they have round bottoms and close up tight so you can easily shake it up.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great for pitcher method!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these pitchers for my breast milk and I love it. I simply take all my pumped milk from the day and collect it all in the pitcher. Makes it so much easier for bottle prep and even fat distribution with the mixing handle. It’s been a few months now and the numbers on the dial have started to fade (not an issue for me but might be for those who rely on it). I would definitely recommend for formula and breast milk feeding mamas!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Bass

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It has a ring around the top to mark the time you made a pitcher so you know when the 24 hours is up. It has a pump so whenever you’re about to pour a bottle you can stir it first. You can’t ask for more. Great price, great value.
customer_reviews.author: FoxyRoxy

customer_reviews.title: Great to have!
customer_reviews.text: I have twins who both need different formula. These are a life saver for me! I can make up a big batch for both and label with their names and I’m good to go for the day! I have not traveled with these, so I can’t speak to that. But they are great to have around the house, so when baby is hungry, I am ready!
customer_reviews.author: Lea Murray

customer_reviews.title: Mixes really well
customer_reviews.text: We have this and it mixes the formula so well. It’s smaller than the other we have so we usually pack it when we are going somewhere. It wouldn’t be a good container in the car, it would definitely leak in a cooler. It does the best job at mixing the formula and we just put it in the dishwasher to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great for mixing and storing milk!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic, slimmer pitcher. We have been using it for breastmilk and it mixes the fat easily. The handle seals the spout when you press it down for storage and you can turn it 90 degrees and it will lock down out of the way of the spout as you pour. It's just really well designed. We haven't had any issues cleaning it either.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetstuff

customer_reviews.title: Good value / easy mixer
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to measure formula with and mix it. It fits nicely in my fridge, which was my issue with the other pitcher I had (too big). I don’t really use the time feature to mark when I have made formula because the dial is a little tricky to turn. I usually remember when I make it so that’s not a big issue. The spinner makes it super easy to mix the formula quickly and I love how it closes easily. It’s also a good price for the product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris  Meany

customer_reviews.title: Saves time
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for mixing baby formula . It keeps formula from having clumps and makes the formula well mixed and easy for baby to digest . Also it’s easy to make formula in advance and keep it in the fridge in this .
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ebbitt

customer_reviews.title: Must have for formula
customer_reviews.text: We used this product for our son’s formula. We got tired of mixing bottles every time especially when he would drink an odd amount of ounces. We didn’t enjoy throwing out the other ounce. I don’t find the time indicator hard to use at all. It doesn’t leak and mixes formula well.
customer_reviews.author: VelociMeagan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t traveled with this so I can’t give a review for that. But it cleans up nice in the dishwasher. Formula mixes really well with warm water. It’s a nice size too and doesn’t take up much room in the refrigerator. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful to use but broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars but the 1st one broke after months. The spiral part separated from the lid. This makes mixing while dealing with the baby so much easier! A one handed operation is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: dahn king

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful when using this. I discovered a scoop worth of food if not more sitting on the bottom that did not get mixed. This can be dangerous over time to baby. Just be aware that this can happen. This does not happen nearly as bad with dr browns pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: wTACTICALp

customer_reviews.title: Great price & super sleek & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super cute & easy to use. Love the color. Perfect & small enough to put in side fridge door. It makes 24oz I think.,perfect enough for me as I didn’t want anything bulky & large & only need it for 24hrs as that’s how long my powder can last in fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Christie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for daycare prep!
customer_reviews.text: Great for prepping bottles for daycare! I’m able to make 2/3 bottles at a time without having to hand mix/shake each one. A real timesaver. Make sure to follow the instructions and do not lift the handle any higher than the liquid in the container to avoid air bubbles. Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Jess P

customer_reviews.title: A no brainer
customer_reviews.text: This is a no brainer if you're using formula. I was fortifying my breastmilk for the first few months and this made things so much easier. It was just enough for about a days worth. I never had any issues with formula not mixing in.
customer_reviews.author: AH5

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on purchasing this because of some bad reviews, but I'm SO GLAD I PURCHASED. This has drastically reduced the amount of foam/bubbles from mixing each bottle separately. It saves me so much time as well, I just mix how much I'm going to need for the day or night and then I can just heat the bottle in the bottle warmer. My 3 week old daughter has had a much better eating experience because there are no bubbles/air to choke her. I would definitely recommend if you are looking for an easy way to prepare a larger amount of formula.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pumping and freezing breastmilk
customer_reviews.text: Using the pitcher method for pumping breastmilk is the way to go if you don’t want to use too many bottles or do bottle laundry everyday. This is a must! And this one mixes the fat and milk really well and it’s easy to pour into cups to measure out freezing into bags.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C Crouther

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it and Only One drawback app
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. Easy to use, Easy to clean, makes making a bottle especially easy. The only thing I dislike is the 24-hour ring at the top. It is superfluous very easy to break and unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: GreAt product
customer_reviews.text: Just started giving formula to my little guy and this makes my life sooo much easier. Doesn’t take up a Lot of space in the fridge and I can prepare Enough formula For The day!
customer_reviews.author: Jill V

customer_reviews.title: The pitcher was extremely easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: The pitcher was extremely easy to use and clean, and the directions were very straightforward. I loved the convenience of having the formula mixed beforehand - especially when my baby daughter gets impatiently "hangry". A convenient, helpful tool to makes things a little easier during these crazy newborn times!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best Formula mixture I have never found on Market
customer_reviews.text: Wow, where do I start from? If you have never been disturbed my Formula foaming as you mix it, this will keep you settled. It mixtures the formula Well, easy to clean . Just want I needed for my Tube feed child
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely helpful. I use boiling water in it and it holds up very well. Works perfectly. Fits in the door of my fidge. Has a dial indicator for time you made the formula or you can use it for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great formula pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. It works great and I love that it has the time band so I can monitor and not use it after 24 hours. It’s a great size for my fridge and easily transported. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pace

customer_reviews.title: Great for mixing formula
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why I waited so long to purchase this. It is a life saver! I can make up to 24oz at once without anything spilling over. I was using a water bottle before and would have to add the formula a few ounces at a time and shake so it would mix ok. If I make a full 24 ounces there might be a tiny bit that leaks on the first pour, I'm talking one or two drops and that's it. Plus it's very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Micaela Villa

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in the middle of the night while making a bottle of formula. So easy to use this and no more wasting formula. Can easily read how many ounces and like you can set what time it was made. We find the mixer easy to spin and does not get clumpy. Such a great purchase, especially at the price! You won’t regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: It works really well!! You have to use it properly to make sure the powder dissolves completely. Always worked as advertised!! Size is good too so it does not take a lot of room in the fridge!!
customer_reviews.author: HLime

customer_reviews.title: Breast milk use
customer_reviews.text: I used for breast milk and was not the most impressed with how this pitcher stirred milk. Fatty often separated from hind milk and didn’t evenly mix with stirrer, otherwise worked fine as a storage container.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. No clumps or foam
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues with formula getting clumps. If I shake it too much then it ends up too foamy. This solves both those issues. Very easy to use and clean and doesn't take long at all to mix
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for formula feeding, in my opinion! Makes the formula nice and silky smooth with no foamy bubbles at the top! It’s so much easier to make my baby’s formula in large batches and it makes nighttime feedings a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Simplified pumping for this first time mom!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 days of using this so far have made being a pumping mom so easy!!! I dont have a tons of caps and bottles out any more and I dont have so many things to wash. I know this is ideally made for bulk formula mixing but I am currently using for exclusively pumping and feeding breast milk. Anything that is pumped goes in the pitcher, before bed I make bottles for the next day, wash the pitcher and then in the morning its ready to go. It will make paternity leave for my husband easy as well! Thanks Munchkin!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Just buy two!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Just buy two for when one is dirty. It makes mixing so much easier. Big improvement in air intake with less gas and fussiness. Easy one handed use. Please let me know if this is helpful, I can update with photos. I buy all my products, but like to help
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew about it before
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about this since my 1st baby. Now at baby #3 it makes giving my baby formula much quicker. Great buy, highly recommend it to all parents that formula feed. I prepare 24 oz which is about 12 scoops every day.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Measurements wash off with use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is on a Dr prescribed formula that is very hard to mix so we bought this and it works really good...the one thing I dislike though is that the measurements are starting to wash off with each use which is a huge let down.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Harper

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for making ahead formula to our the exact amount you need. Especially good for soy formula, which gets super clumpy and fills with bubbles when you shake it giving baby horrific gas.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan S.

customer_reviews.title: It is great for pre-mixing formula for a few bottles at once ...
customer_reviews.text: This formula pitcher makes prepping bottles a breeze! It is great for pre-mixing formula for a few bottles at once so when it’s time for a feeding, you can grab a bottle quickly. The container can be made airtight and the ring on the top helps you keep track of when you made it, so you can easily recognize if it is still good. I’ve found that it mixes very easily, with less air bubbles and clumps than when you shake the formula in a bottle. Overall a great product that will save you time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I don't think that it seals quite well enough to take it for traveling unless you keep it sitting up right and it won't get jostled around then it would be fine. Everything else works perfectly as it should. My daughter's formula is made with rice starch so it doesn't just get air bubbles it gets frothy. Her formula is not a type you can shake it has to be stirred so this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Great for bottle prep!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to batch mix formula! It’s great for prepping bottles especially if your little one is in between serving scoops like mine is. Because it only holds 24oz I make 2 batches to get the amount I need when prepping, but it doesn’t really bother me that much. Other reviewers have mentioned mold starting to grow in the handle and I can see how this might become an issue over time, but I haven’t had a problem with it in the last 2 months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Roach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for breastmilk
customer_reviews.text: This is great for breastmilk, I’m an EP and use this for the pitcher method. It really incorporates the fat back into the milk! I was using a blender bottle but it was so messy this is a nice size
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have twins and we use this every day! It's great to not have to measure and pour bottles at 3am because it's already made. Less formula list to the counter also.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Life changer!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I do not know how I survived without this pitcher, it was one of the best baby purchases I have ever made. I have not used any other formula pitchers but I have not felt like I needed to try any others. This pitcher mixes the formula really effortlessly, has a handy dial so you can remember when the mixture will expire and I think it is the perfect size for a 24 hr period.
customer_reviews.author: Tobias Keil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect not so big
customer_reviews.text: Perfect not so big like other brands I've bought this 1 here holds upto 24 oz fits well in my fridge without taking up so much space so easy to use I'm glad I bought this one
customer_reviews.author: Jay&Liz

customer_reviews.title: Super handy but could use a little
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy tool to have in hand for sure, but I really wish there were more room at the top for mixing to full capacity. If you’re making more than 20 oz at a time, it’s very difficult to mix and I often have to take the lid off and scrap the sides down to get all the formula dissolved. Otherwise, it’s really great.
customer_reviews.author: karen izzz

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have two since I make a lot of formula every day (twin boys). It's easy to clean and so far the numbering on the side of the container has not washed off (used for a little over a month). I would recommend this to anyone who makes daily batches of formula!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best $10 I've spent since i switched to formula. So easy to blend the formula in this thing. No clumps of formula in the bottle. No more shake, shake, shaking the bottles until your arm is about to fall off! This is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luis Inoa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to use and clean. I should've bought this a long time ago. It's also a time saver. All I have to do is warm the bottles up. I love this pitcher! It's the perfect size it fits right in my little personal refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit at first I thought this product was totally unnecessary, but I bought it anyway. Now I use it every day and it’s probably my handiest piece of baby gear! I make all the formula for the day before the little one wakes up and then simply pour into a bottle when needed for the remainder of the day! Makes juggling a hungry, crying baby much easier when there aren’t as many steps to getting each bottle ready!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Plumley

customer_reviews.title: Am I so very glad we got it
customer_reviews.text: Do you need this? No. Am I so very glad we got it? Yes. Other than the convenience factor, I really like having a pitcher full of pre-made formula for when we have a babysitter. Makes it so much easier for them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love that this helps me prep many bottles at once to take to my child's care center. I've used it SO many times (cleaned it promptly after each use) and have seen zero mold like what's stated in other reviews. As long as you're not pumping it like a crazy person, it shouldn't come out of the top, even when filling it to the full 24 oz. It's so simple even my husband can do it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shelnutt

customer_reviews.title: Used this to make formula in bulk
customer_reviews.text: This product was a life saver for my little one. We made her formula in bulk to reduce bubbles from shaking. We were able to make a days worth of formula and mark when it was last made so everyone knows when it was going to expire.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Arlinghaus

customer_reviews.title: top won't come off 😐
customer_reviews.text: i loved this when i first bought it . it worked great for about a week but then tonight i go to open it to wash it and mix more formula and it's as if the top is fused to the bottle . everyone in my house has tried to screw it off and it will not budge . we've run it under hot & cold water and it will not budge . we've tried screwing it off with a towel , we've tried wedging a butter knife in it . nothing has worked . disappointed to say the least 😐😐😐
customer_reviews.author: Selena Gibbons

product_meta.title: Munchkin Smart Blend Formula Mixing Pitcher, Green, 24 Ounce
product_meta.description: Mixing powered formula shouldn't take the fun out of feeding time. Munchkin's Smart Blend Formula Mixing Pitcher makes every bottle the best bottle it can be. Easy to use mixing pitcher breaks up formula clumps quickly and reduces air bubbles compared to shaking a bottle. The results is smooth, consistent formula everytime. Large pitcher allows you to make up to 24 oz of baby formula at a time so you are always ready in the middle of the night or on-the-go. Mixing handle rotates into an open position for pouring milk or into a closed position to seal lid to help keep formula fresh when stored. Adjustable time ring takes the guess work out of and keeps track of when formula is prepared. Say good-bye to bubbles and clumps for easy feedings made simple.
feature_bullets: Easily mixes & stores up to 24 oz of baby formula
Designed to reduce air bubbles, compared to shaking formula in a bottle
BPA-free formula mixer blends and breaks up clumps quickly
Rotating mixing handle seals lid to help keep formula fresh when being stored
Adjustable time ring keeps track of when formula was prepared

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,132 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
